title: Hacked??
body: Just now i tried to sign on to my lol account and it would not let me. The password i origionally used was changed. I dont know how but this happened to my first account too. But i did not manage to get my first account back. I dont know whats happening but it feels as if my accounts are being targetted. I have no idea why because atm i am bronze cuz of disconnecting in all 10 of my placements. He only thing i could think of is because i spend money on champions and skins

replies.body: I'd strongly urge you to hit up our account specialists as soon as possible in order to get your account back! You can reach out to them through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).
